subject: College Athletics
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nelson Becerra scored on a penalty kick in overtime Saturday as host St. John’s overcame a two-goal deficit to defeat Indiana, 3-2, and advance to the semifinals of the N.C.A.A. men’s soccer tournament. The No. 3 Red Storm (19-2-3) will face Maryland on Friday.
